title: bitxoe
author: bitxoe
content: Hello, I'm a full-time marketer and PR manager. Due to an unfortunate event in 2022, I had to shut down my small but established agency. As of now, I need a quick job to make some money before the year ends. Please suggest, what can be done through this account, and on bitcointalk.Regards,

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: A huge majority of users here on Bitcointalk aren't really that fond of DeFi/Web3; you're honestly far better off probably cold emailing/messaging existing DeFi/Web3 projects.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.created_time: December 26, 2022, 04:01:21 PMLast edit: December 26, 2022, 04:51:26 PM by Little Mouse
comments.body: There's no way to make quick money here through the services you mentioned above. You can offer your services in service board with your experience and portfolio. Make sure to add all the projects you have worked with. Then bump the thread every 24 hours. You may get some work but let me assure you that it's pretty hard to get one.Quote from: noorman0 on December 26, 2022, 04:15:15 PMNot meant to be intimidating, generally users of this forum prefer to do business with reputable accounts (I didn't see this critera on your account)..No need if OP looks for a bounty management job with low payment lol.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Not meant to be intimidating, generally users of this forum prefer to do business with reputable accounts (I didn't see this critera on your account)..The only suggestion is to offer your skills on this board. Or if you're fine with something irrelevant to your job and not limited to a pre-new years deadline, you can try your luck at this contest.May good luck be on your side.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Sorry to go off-topic here OPQuote from: mk4 on December 26, 2022, 10:02:52 AMA huge majority of users here on Bitcointalk aren't really that fond of DeFi/Web3; you're honestly far better off probably cold emailing/messaging existing DeFi/Web3 projects.Can you point me in the right direction of reading more about this?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Since you are a marketer do you have knowledge about SEO?Then if you have why not try CPA networks that pay crypto or Bitcoin?You can check algo-affiliates and promote some of their offers check their info here https://www.affpaying.com/algoaffiliates Or other CPA networks that pays with Bitcoin you can this one below - https://www.affpaying.com/olavivo You can also use that tool to find other CPA networks that pays in Bitcoin.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: BenCodie on December 26, 2022, 11:30:28 PMCan you point me in the right direction of reading more about this?Look up DeFi/Web3 projects you're actually interested in(or just DeFi/Web3 projects in general, totally up to you), then simply message their founder on social media(mostly on Twitter or through their email).

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on December 27, 2022, 04:49:24 AMQuote from: BenCodie on December 26, 2022, 11:30:28 PMCan you point me in the right direction of reading more about this?Look up DeFi/Web3 projects you're actually interested in(or just DeFi/Web3 projects in general, totally up to you), then simply message their founder on social media(mostly on Twitter or through their email).Sorry mk4 - I meant pointing me in the right direction about reading more about this comment:Quote from: mk4 on December 26, 2022, 10:02:52 AMA huge majority of users here on Bitcointalk aren't really that fond of DeFi/Web3

comments.author: bitxoe
comments.body: Thank You everyone for your feedback and suggestions.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: bitxoe on December 26, 2022, 09:03:41 AMHello, I'm a full-time marketer and PR manager. Due to an unfortunate event in 2022, I had to shut down my small but established agency. As of now, I need a quick job to make some money before the year ends. Please suggest, what can be done through this account, and on bitcointalk.Regards,We all need money and since you have a skill in PR / Marketing for dApps, Web3 projects why not give it a shot in the service section you can offer a free trial since you have not yet established your reputation here, but once you got few good feedbacks I'm sure more clients will come in, marketing is very a competitive niche, and starting is the hardest part here in Bitcointalk so you need to be fully motivated to keep going.

comments.author: cryptochainwire
comments.body: Quote from: bitxoe on December 26, 2022, 09:03:41 AMHello, I'm a full-time marketer and PR manager. Due to an unfortunate event in 2022, I had to shut down my small but established agency. As of now, I need a quick job to make some money before the year ends. Please suggest, what can be done through this account, and on bitcointalk.Regards,You can send us your previous work or portfolio at contact@cryptochainwire.comThanksTeamCrypto Chainwire

comments.author: Durdenkingtyler
comments.body: Hi,I am the owner of a Cryptocurrency network on Reddit with 100k+ members (not all active though). Looking for someone who can help me manage the subreddits and set up partnership deals for advertising on the subreddits.If you are interested in working with me (we share the revenue) feel free to PM me.
